content: Diversification and profitable growth from lines of business without cardinal hurricane risk is now providing a considerable earnings base that enables us to have an adjusted combined ratio of 90% and an adjusted ROE, excluding unrealized and realized gains and losses of 10% in a quarter where we incur a full retention loss.
